title: Cosi Fan Tutte
brief_description: The Swedish conductor Arnold Ostman collaborates with German producer Willy Decker on this ever popular Mozart comedy with an extensively rehearsed cast of young Swedish singers. The setting is the immaculately restored 18th century Drottningholm Court Theatre at the country residence of the Swedish Royal Family.
